mapper.select: SELECT m.*, ma.my_address_num, ma.recipient_name, ma.recipient_phone_num, ma.address1, ma.address2, ma.address_name, ma.address_main, ac.account_num, ac.account_bank, ac.account_name, ac.account_main FROM MEMBER m LEFT JOIN MY_ADDRESS ma ON m.member_id = ma.member_id LEFT JOIN MY_ACCOUNT ac ON m.member_id = ac.member_id WHERE 1=1 AND m.member_id = #{sId} AND ma.address_main = TRUE AND ac.account_main = TRUE;
